1.content: Mobile App Development - React Native Progressive Web App
1.details: Convert existing Next.js web app to mobile-optimized PWA with offline capabilities, push notifications, and native mobile features like camera integration for QR menu scanning

2.details: Implement ML-powered recommendation system using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid approach. Include restaurant suggestions based on user preferences, location, past bookings, time patterns, and social data

3.details: Add i18n support for major languages (English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese). Include RTL support, localized date/time formats, currency conversion, and culturally appropriate UI adjustments

4.details: Integrate with major delivery platforms (Uber Eats, DoorDash, Grubhub) to provide seamless ordering experience. Include real-time delivery tracking, menu synchronization, and order management

5.details: Implement AR menu viewing, virtual restaurant tours, 360¬∞ photos, and AR food preview. Include WebXR support for immersive dining experiences

6.details:
‚úÖ VIP tier system (Bronze/Silver/Gold/Platinum/Diamond)
‚úÖ Points earning system (bookings: 10pts, deliveries: 15pts, referrals: 100pts, social: 5pts)
‚úÖ Gamification (achievements, badges, streaks, challenges)
‚úÖ Birthday rewards and Nigerian cultural celebrations
‚úÖ Partner merchant integration (banks, telcos, retail)
‚úÖ Exclusive benefits and VIP experiences
‚úÖ Leaderboards and social competition
‚úÖ Points redemption system
‚úÖ Mobile-optimized loyalty dashboard
‚úÖ Analytics tracking and performance metrics
